summary: Malicious PowerShell activity detected on ws-eng-1 with potential lateral movement to db-1 via MSSQL.

affected_hosts.reason: PowerShell (PID 816) spawned cmd.exe with full privileges (0x1fffff) and initiated a network connection to db-1:1433.
Received a network connection from compromised host ws-eng-1 on port 1433 (MSSQL), indicating potential data access.
